subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Erika DeSouza tied a career high with 27 points and grabbed 15 rebounds, Lindsey Harding scored 25 points and the host Atlanta Dream (3-7) rallied for an 87-81 victory over the Liberty (4-5).
snippet: Erika DeSouza tied a career high with 27 points and grabbed 15 rebounds, Lindsey Harding scored 25 points and the host Atlanta Dream (3-7) rallied for an 87-81 victory over the Liberty (4-5).
